mapper.select: SELECT ROD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID AS RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID, R.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, R.NM AS NM, RII.DT AS DT, RII.PASS_QY AS PASS_QY, RII.INFER_QY AS INFER_QY, RII.MNGR AS MNGR FROM RWMATR_IST_INSP RII JOIN RWMATR R ON RII.RWMATR_ID = R.RWMATR_ID JOIN RWMATR_ORDER_DETA ROD ON ROD.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID = RII.RWMATR_ORDER_DETA_ID
